game.title: Dragon Slayer
game.objective: Slay the dragon terrorizing the village.
game.description: The village of Greenfield is under attack by a fearsome dragon. The villagers have turned to the brave adventurers to slay the beast and save their village.
game.reward: 100 gold, a magic sword, and the title of Dragon Slayer

task.description: Talk to the villagers and gather information about the dragon's lair, its habits, and its weaknesses.
Use the information gathered in Task 1 to craft a weapon that is effective against dragons.
Travel to the dragon's lair, located in the nearby mountains.
Use the dragon-slaying weapon to defeat the dragon.
Return to Greenfield and report your success to the villagers.
